explicit.speaker: iPhone
explicit.text: I don't know exactly what symbiosis is doing, you know, I just trust on G and what, actually, I'm sure that it's, you know, this, this is the system he, working on that and it can, personally. I don't know the detail of the system.

explicit.speaker: iPhone
explicit.text: I don't know what to say, you know, to, to actually, I want to reply to that customer. And some of that, at least for myself, probably, I don't know yet. It's not very clear. And we haven't decided and we don't have the minimum viable system as.

explicit.speaker: Prakash Gabra
explicit.text: Fathad, has Fathad shared this document with us? I haven't seen the document, the performance of the private equity.

breakthroughs.speaker: Alex Alegria (metalucks.com)
breakthroughs.text: I'm just saying that we are waiting for us to crash.

breakthroughs.speaker: Christopher Herghelegiu
breakthroughs.text: Is that solution, I guess, ready? And if it's ready, that's a GE question. And if it's ready, I would say, yes, let's use it. I mean, that would be my suggestion because... that because... So it's going to enable all of us to see where there might be bugs, things that need to be improved, things that don't need to be improved. So I think that's a great way to test the software, especially in GiveG the feedback on the developmental side. So I would suggest let's jump in ASAP.

breakthroughs.speaker: Sudheer
breakthroughs.text: I'm okay to go with that, Alex. I think I'm okay to just go ahead, check it in the next couple of days, not do anything. And if you're comfortable, choose to roll this out across auto-competitive.

breakthroughs.speaker: Christopher Herghelegiu
breakthroughs.text: I think it's extremely valid. And I appreciate your acknowledgement of it, because I do think it's relevant and needed. And I think both can be happening simultaneously. Maybe not the genuine outreach, but we looked through the lens of all of the things we're doing internal is for the external. And I think that is probably a really good way to approach it.

breakthroughs.speaker: Christopher Herghelegiu
breakthroughs.text: this is probably the most important thing that we need to do. Is, yes, you know, our front-facing communication. And, you know, I see this even a little deeper. I almost see that in our structure, there should be a media company.

breakthroughs.speaker: Christopher Herghelegiu
breakthroughs.text: And I think Anastasia is going to confirm, but we're pretty confident that the charter she has is symbiotic to the U.S. And the reason why I think this is really important, as we're working through our financial structure and taking in investment dollars, that is going to take some time. There's no question, right? That has to be done right. But philanthropic giving is not a hard lift. And if people believe in our ideas and believe in our thought process and want to support us, I think it's a great way to maybe get in some of those much-needed dollars, especially as it relates to Villagaya, as it relates.

breakthroughs.speaker: iPhone
breakthroughs.text: I am so grateful for our tribe. And I don't feel alone anymore. So I'm extremely grateful for that.

actions.speaker: Sudheer
actions.text: complete circle OKRs and roles by next week

actions.speaker: iPhone
actions.text: wait for final comments from Perkash to finalize private equity structure

actions.text: circulate cash flow forecast format by end of meeting

actions.text: start developing visuals, website, comms, and branding

actions.text: share framework for inner circle charter individually

actions.speaker: Sudheer
actions.text: discuss HR policy and compensation in next meeting

actions.speaker: iPhone
actions.text: send specified answer regarding private equity structure by email

actions.speaker: Anastasia Kalinina
actions.text: examine the need of another structure in the U.S. for philanthropic giving

decisions.speaker: Alex Alegria (metalucks.com)
decisions.text: We will use Symbiosis across the board, with Sudheer in charge of training and implementation support.

decisions.speaker: Alex Alegria (metalucks.com)
decisions.text: The SME pitch development will be handled by the business development circle in collaboration with the communication circle, with no immediate task for the full group.

decisions.speaker: Alex Alegria (metalucks.com)
decisions.text: Chris will be the next facilitator for the upcoming meeting.

decisions.speaker: Alex Alegria (metalucks.com)
decisions.text: Shamla will act as the secretary of the meeting, taking notes and sharing outcomes.

decisions.speaker: Alex Alegria (metalucks.com)
decisions.text: Giannandrea G will be the governance steward.

decisions.speaker: Alex Alegria (metalucks.com)
decisions.text: Sudheer will be the integration lead.

decisions.speaker: Alex Alegria (metalucks.com)
decisions.text: Giannandrea G will be the reporting steward.

decisions.speaker: Alex Alegria (metalucks.com)
decisions.text: We will continue with weekly meetings for now, with the day shifted to Tuesday.

decisions.speaker: Alex Alegria (metalucks.com)
decisions.text: The task of investor outreach and workshops will be moved to the asset management and finance circles.

decisions.speaker: Alex Alegria (metalucks.com)
decisions.text: We will proceed with launching the circles now.

recommendations.text: Encourage more balanced participation by actively inviting input from less vocal speakers, especially during decision-making points.
Implement a structured agenda management tool (like Symbiosis) to track discussion items, decisions, and action items more effectively, ensuring all points are addressed or explicitly deferred.
Prioritize the development of a 'minimum viable system' for external communication (SME pitch, website narrative) to address explicit knowledge gaps and provide clarity for external stakeholders.
Continue fostering an environment where objections and clarifying questions are welcomed and addressed, as demonstrated in the Symbiosis discussion, to ensure all voices are heard before decisions.
Formalize the roles and responsibilities within the inner circle and newly forming circles with clear charters and KPIs to provide structure and guidance for all participants.
Develop a clear HR policy and compensation framework to address the value of contributions and attract talent, as this is a critical foundational element.
Expedite the finalization of the private equity structure and the mandate for capital raising, as this is crucial for funding the ecosystem.
Leverage the identified 'breakthrough moments' (e.g., gratitude for tribe, increasing trust) to reinforce positive relational dynamics and build collective purpose.
